channel.title: Runescape Server for C#.net?
channel.description: I have plans on rewriting the server for C#.net so that you can make it a compiled EXE easily. Personally i think it's a much better language to work with as well. What do you people think? For example: RunUO (www.runuo.com) is a Ultima Online private server coded in C#.net, and the coding is spectacular, plus it's much easier coding in .net languages due to it's easy nature. Visual Studio 2005 helps alot when coding.
